courses.text: We use everyday activities to contextualize our lessons
courses.imageDescription: an halter, a racket, a football helmet, a baskball, boxing gloves, and a football in an orange triangular background.

courses.text: Our classes are playfull to maxmize students participation
courses.imageDescription: a videogame controller, a diamond, a sword, a card and a browser window in a green background.

courses.text: We believe that kids learn to speak English... by speaking!
courses.imageDescription: a boy saying pencil, carrying a ruler and 2 books in an orange background.
